latest_news.title: Bitcoin Just Broke Up with Nasdaq — And No One Saw It Coming
latest_news.summary: Bitcoin lagged the Nasdaq last week due to a leverage washout. Analysts point to speculative demand. US-China talks & CPI are now in focus.

latest_news.title: Coinbase Institutional Highlights Three Catalysts That Could Lift Crypto in Q4 2025
latest_news.summary: In a Q4 2025 outlook report, Coinbase Institutional says the cycle still skews positive — with liquidity, stablecoins and policy progress lifting the market.

latest_news.title: Stablecoins' $1 Peg Is a 'Misconception,' Says NYDIG After $500 Billion Market Meltdown
latest_news.summary: The recent $500 billion crypto market sell-off revealed the instability of stablecoins, with prices fluctuating even for stablecoins.

latest_news.title: Bitcoin Briefly Slips Below $105,000. Is It Time to Buy?
latest_news.summary: Think about Bitcoin's long-term potential before you buy the dip.
